Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants where both activities occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in the variant containing the longest review cycle
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time for Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to be followed by any reviewer response activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs afterward
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed compared to the time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in relation to the preceding SW-AE Assign Reviewers activity within the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Cycle Time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 defined as the duration from the prior reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-AE Assign Reviewers or Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1) to the next definitive reviewer outcome (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: the average of the duration between the first time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' or `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and the last time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' or `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Declined' or `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Minimum time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that include multiple reviewer invitation reminders
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed follows immediately
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Elapsed time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to the final decision activity (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision) when SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs subsequently
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in manuscripts that undergo major revision versus minor revision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed in the context of delayed reviewer selection (e.g., after activities like SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late or SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed grouped by case:concept:name
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
